guide.conclusion: Fog machines can be unruly beasts. Especially the non-professional models you buy for halloween. With low duty cycles, causing massive amounts of fog when you don't need it, and no fog when you do. Wouldn't it be nice to have fog only when people come up to your house? Yeah, I thought so too. Here we are going to make a motion triggered fog machine that will turn on when ever someone comes up to your door.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Fog machines can be unruly beasts. Especially the non-professional models you buy for halloween. With low duty cycles, causing massive amounts of fog when you don't need it, and no fog when you do. Wouldn't it be nice to have fog only when people come up to your house? Yeah, I thought so too. Here we are going to make a motion triggered fog machine that will turn on when ever someone comes up to your door.

Relevant parts
  • 12v spdt relay
  • HC-SR04 Distance Sensor
  • NPN transistor, EBC pinout
  • Diode
  • 220OHM resistor
  • 9v battery snap
  • Project box, small
  • Heat Shrink tubing
  • Copper Clad PerfBoard
  • Stranded Hookup wire
  • Solid Core Hookup Wire
  • Fog Machine WITH A REMOTE
Tools
  • Dremel
  • Helping hands
  • Soldering iron
  • Wire strippers
  • wire snips
guide.summary: Turn an ordinary fog machine into a motion triggered fog machine.
